divs: sighting detailsi was heading westbound on grand river west of the airport on my motorcycle. the sun was shining appox in the southwest. i don't know why but this bright light caught my eye. (there were high thin clouds but the object was below them) i first thought that it was the headlight of an airplane landing but it seemed much brighter, almost like a welding torch, being that the sun was bright and i had sunglasses on. this light hovered, got even brighter then fizzled out leaving a silver\grey ball that then faded out in about 2 seconds. i was amazed that that silver\grey ball was left behind. i have no idea what that could have been. the time is within a minute or two as i was cutting it close with my daughter coming home from school
